00020 
00021 namespace state_handling
00022 {
00030     void tilde_to_bar (double *state, double sinA, double cosA)
00031     {
00032         double tmp =  cosA*state[0] + sinA*state[3];
00033         state[3]   = -sinA*state[0] + cosA*state[3];
00034         state[0]   = tmp;
00035     }
00036 
00044     void bar_to_tilde (double *state, double sinA, double cosA)
00045     {
00046         double tmp = cosA*state[0] - sinA*state[3];
00047         state[3]   = sinA*state[0] + cosA*state[3];
00048         state[0]   = tmp;
00049     }
00050 
00051 
00058     void tilde_to_orig (double *state, double h)
00059     {
00060         state[0] = state[0] + h * state[2];
00061         state[0] = state[3] + h * state[5];
00062     }
00063 
00064 
00072     void get_next_state_tilde (double *state, double *X, chol_solve_param csp)
00073     {
00074         for (int i = 0; i < NUM_STATE_VAR; i++)
00075         {
00076             state[i] = X[i];
00077         }
00078 
00079         state_handling::bar_to_tilde (state, csp.angle_sin[0], csp.angle_cos[0]);
00080     }
00081 
00082 
00090     void get_next_state (double *state, double *X, chol_solve_param csp)
00091     {
00092         get_next_state_tilde (state, X, csp);
00093         state_handling::tilde_to_orig (state, csp.h[0]);
00094     }
00095 }
